attributes.action: Stop the sale of British Nuclear power to ANY foreign company or Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the proposed sale of the BRITISH nuclear power industry will leave this great country without any input into nuclear power generation.
This will also allow foreign companies control of fissile material on MY country.
Nuclear power in this country should be owned, managed AND protected by HM forces on British Land...
